name: Low Drive
details:
Bass Overdrive PedalBeen wanting a versatile overdrive pedal for your bass? Take a look at the JHS Low Drive, which gives you intense low-end response while maintaining the definition of your mids and highs. No mud here. This minimalist-looking pedal has just Volume, Tone, and Drive knobs to take you from mild to wild, and will even run on 18v power for a punchier drive. Use the JHS Low Drive for its intended bass purposes or throw it into your guitar's rig for a crazy overdrive. 
https://www.jhspedals.info/discontinued-and-rare
